mapper.select: select u.id userId, u.*,case when s.end_date > now() THEN '활성화' else '비활성화' end as subscribe, w.wave, w.mileage from user_tb u left join subscribe_tb s on u.id = s.user_id left join wallet_tb w on u.id = w.user_id
mapper.update: update lend_tb set status = 1 where EXTRACT(DAY FROM return_date) = EXTRACT(DAY FROM NOW()) - 1 AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM return_date) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM NOW()) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM return_date) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM NOW())
